ext_weather.name: Tonight
ext_weather.shortForecast: Chance Light Rain then Areas Of Fog
ext_weather.detailedForecast: A chance of rain and patchy fog before 7pm, then areas of fog and a slight chance of rain. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 44. Southwest wind 0 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.
